content:
本件保存
會員委設建庫 水 門 石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
年
SDC - 5281
June 13, 1962
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject :
GSA Surplus Materials
Dear Mr. Li:
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1533 dated June 11, 1962 and the GSA Catalogue No. 41 on the above sub ject. 許躍爾
It is recommended by MKA that the wire rope as indicated in Mr. Johnson's letter is required by the Shihmen Project, we, therefore, request your arrangement with AID/C to allocate these wire ropes to Shihmen Project for meeting our construction require- ments.
Your action on this matter will be highly appreciated.
E
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.11. 1h W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.6. 15 11843 V.O.
8.G.
(2) (3)
3 3 CUSA
Enclosures
cc:
Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C
Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
Dam Construction Dept. SDC
吉
244
國史饭 Academia Historica
